author: Mario Capitelli
text:
We are moving towards a large capital project and have equipment needs for our PEG Station. That highly technical equipment requires expensive and specialized installation, labor that would be done by a non staff contractors. Everyone is in agreement the equipment can be purchased with the PEG funds, the installation of said equipment seems to be grey area. Any input would be helpful.
Precedents, links, guidelines, anything would be helpful.
title: PEG Franchise Fee's use for equipment Installation
